amendment.description: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide extended and additional protection to Medicare beneficiaries who enroll for the Medicare prescription drug benefit during 2006.

action.text: Amendment SA 2601 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2601 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 47. Record Vote Number: 342.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2601.

Amendment SA 2601 proposed by Senator Nelson FL. (consideration: CR S13119, S13128-13129) To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide extended and additional protection to Medicare beneficiaries who enroll for the Medicare prescription drug benefit during 2006.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2601 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 47. Record Vote Number: 342.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2601 proposed by Senator Nelson FL.
